ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent woes....
ygData.msgSnippet: Did I say Squire? I meant Scryer.  Squire pops very frequently and seems to have the Fork a lot (as someone else mentioned) but the Scryer? I think he is an
ygData.messageBody:
Did I say Squire? I meant Scryer. Squire pops very frequently and seems to
have the Fork a lot (as someone else mentioned) but the Scryer? I think he
is an urban myth.

-Faras

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mike Roach [mailto:Mike.Roach@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2000 2:16 PM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent woes....
>
>
> I have NEVER seen the bloody Squire. One night I decided I
> would meet the
> Squire once and for all and I planted myself up on the ledge
> in the corner
> near that alcove and started reading a book. 18 minutes,
> kill PH, kill
> other 2 frog shaman as they spawn (spread em out to pop one
> after another).
> Read book, rinse, repeat. Four hours pass, nothing but
> placeholders...still
> have never seen even a corpse from the Squire to this day.
> Nice random
> number generator at work ;-)
>
> -Faras
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Sylly Songsynger [mailto:jgs@...]
> > Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2000 2:12 PM
> > To: eqbards@egroups.com
> > Subject: Re: [eqbards] Lambent woes....
> >
> >
> > The spot is an 18 min spawn (like most of them in Upper Guk).
> > Scryer shows
> > up about every 4 th or 5th time iirc. Woven grass is the
> > common, shimmering
> > orb is uncommon (1 in 10???). Easy enough to camp Scryer and
> > Warden (elf
> > hide gloves & troll hide belt) and scryer. Squire too - if
> > you can find his
> > spot (i dont know him was well).
> >
> > Sylly.
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
> > To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
> > Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2000 10:48 AM
> > Subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent woes....
> >
> >
> > > I've never even seen the Scryer, except one time as a
> > corpse when I was
> > > exploring as a youngin. The few times I have been in the
> > room talking to
> > > campers he hasn't ever popped. How rare a spawn is he?
> > Always wanted one
> > > of them glowing shield thingees, just never could justify
> > the cost. Now
> > if
> > > I could just get John to quantify the damage reduction one
> > would see by
> > > raising their AC by 5-6%...
> > >
> > > Kit
> > >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: Cyr, Thierry [mailto:thierry.cyr@...]
> > > Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2000 9:41 AM
> > > To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> > > Subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent woes....
> > >
> > >
> > > you paid 1600pp for a fork? geez you got bent over
> backwards on that
> > > deal.... So often have i seen him up with a fork it isnt
> > funny, i just
> > run
> > > by him to get to lower guk, oh look he's up and has a fork,
> > kill /gu ok
> > who
> > > needs a fork...
> > >
> > > I've killed him 3 times just runnin by him, and camped him
> > for 1 once too.
> > > traded one for black embroided sleeves. and gave 2 of em
> to buddies
> > >
> > > Rakka
> > > Sol Ro
> > >
> > > > -----Original Message-----
> > > > From: John_Senior@... [SMTP:John_Senior@...]
> > > > Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2000 12:24 PM
> > > > To: eqbards@egroups.com
> > > > Subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent woes....
> > > >
> > > > Yeah, I really wanted one =P
> > > > Hmmm, I am 99% sure that my one doesn't have +10 magic,
> I'll check
> > tonight
> > > > and then post a reply tomorrow.
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > Lonnie Lewis <llewis@...> on 11/04/2000 15:16:51
> > > >
> > > > Please respond to eqbards@egroups.com
> > > >
> > > > To: "'eqbards@egroups.com'" <eqbards@egroups.com>
> > > > cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
> > > > Subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent woes....
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > 1600 pp?? for a runed bone fork??
> > > >
> > > > and yes, it's +10 MR also.
> > > >
> > > > Bien
> > > >
> > > > p.s. 1600pp??
> > > >
> > > > > -----Original Message-----
> > > > > From: John_Senior@... [SMTP:John_Senior@...]
> > > > > Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2000 12:11 PM
> > > > > To: eqbards@egroups.com
> > > > > Subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent woes....
> > > > >
> > > > >
> > > > >
> > > > > >>Ranged: Runed Bone Fork (dam 5, delay 29, +10 vs
> > fire, +10 vs cold,
> > > > +10
> > > > > vs
> > > > > >>magic)
> > > > >
> > > > > Whats all this talk of +10 vs magic?? I have runed bone
> > fork and I'm
> > > > sure
> > > > > it is only +10 vs fire/cold resists. Is it just me
> > being senile or do
> > I
> > > > > have a dodgy item here (was purchased from a member of
> > FoH). The damn
> > > > > thing
> > > > > cos me 1600pp so I hope I didn't get a faulty item =P
> > > > >
> > > > > Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 44 songs <Guardians of Light>
> > > > > Veeshan Server
